vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 2 to the professional services contract with VRX, Inc. for the design of additional paving, drainage, water and wastewater main improvements for the West Red Bird Lane Bridge over Woody Branch Creek Project - Not to exceed $207,085.00, from $335,166.68 to $542,251.68 - Financing: 2023 Certificate of Obligation ($183,470.00), Water Capital Improvement G Fund ($17,711.25), and Wastewater Capital Improvement F Fund ($5,903.75)
vote.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 2 to the professional services contract with VRX, Inc. for the design of additional paving, drainage, water and wastewater main improvements for the West Red Bird Lane Bridge over Woody Branch Creek Project - Not to exceed $207,085.00, from $335,166.68 to $542,251.68 - Financing: 2023 Certificate of Obligation ($183,470.00), Water Capital Improvement G Fund ($17,711.25), and Wastewater Capital Improvement F Fund ($5,903.75)
